InstructionData.Title: simple-cooling-tower-script
InstructionData.Author: Basic IC10 Compiler
InstructionData.Instructions: # Switch on-off and see the pin's names alias sensor d0 #l.1 alias pump d1 #l.1 yield #l.1 # Automatically evacuates cooling-tower when temp # is below 40C # needs a volume pump and a gas analyzer # Set the volume pump to its max capacity l r0 d1 Maximum #l.13 s d1 Setting r0 #l.13 Start: yield #l.16 # one tick l r1 d0 Temperature #l.17 l r0 d0 Pressure #l.18 slt r2 r1 313.15 #l.20 sgt r1 r0 0 #l.21 and r0 r2 r1 #l.23 s d1 On r0 #l.23 j Start #l.24 # Compiled at 2025-10-27 12:21 by Exca's Basic10.
